Instance Method# spawnUnlessCancelled(priority:operation:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
mutating func spawnUnlessCancelled(
    priority: TaskPriority? = nil,
    operation: @escaping () async -> ChildTaskResult
) -> Bool
```

Available when `ChildTaskResult` conforms to `Sendable`.## [See Also](/documentation/swift/taskgroup/spawnunlesscancelled(priority:operation:)#see-also)
